pr_title: [Docs] [Master] Add Missing DB related information in documentation

timeline.message: Add Missing DB related information in documentation

timeline.bodyText: Sub-heading are written in sentence case and only the page heading is written in Title case. So in this case "Storage Requirements" should start with lower case.
timeline.author: Mariangela
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -87,6 +87,53 @@ If you have difficulty in setting up any WSO2 product in a specific platform or +## Database Storage Requirements

timeline.bodyText:
In user guides we do not use the term "please".
When pointing off to a document, we say "For more information, see XYZ" so instead of refer we use the word "see".
timeline.author: Mariangela
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,3 +31,6 @@ management and registry data are stored in the `<API-M_HOME>/dbscripts` folder.
 -   [Changing to IBM DB2]({{base_path}}/install-and-setup/setting-up-databases/changing-default-databases/changing-to-ibm-db2)
 -   [Changing to MariaDB]({{base_path}}/install-and-setup/setting-up-databases/changing-default-databases/changing-to-mariadb)
 
+!!! Note
+
+    - To configure databases for Analytics, please refer the [Configuring Datasources for Analytics](https://docs.wso2.com/display/SP440/Configuring+Datasources)
